HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: PPL Parcel: 125 Kč (Free for orders over 1500 Kč). Česká pošta - Balík do ruky: 139 Kč.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: PPL Atyp: 349 Kč (max 30 kg, 205 cm). DHL Soukromá paleta: 429 Kč (31-50 kg), 489 Kč (51-75 kg), 589 Kč (76-100 kg), 689 Kč (101-150 kg), 819 Kč (151-200 kg).

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: PPL Parcel Shop: 59 Kč. Zásilkovna: 69 Kč. Česká pošta - Balík na poštu: 105 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.cod_surcharge: 29 Kč (Payment must be made online via the Zásilkovna app)

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: The e-shop offers home delivery, bulky item delivery, parcel shop/locker pickup, and in-store pickup. PROVIDERS: Main carriers are PPL, Česká pošta, Zásilkovna, and DHL for pallets. PRICING: Home delivery starts at 125 Kč (PPL) with free shipping over 1500 Kč. Parcel shop delivery is cheaper, starting at 59 Kč (PPL Parcel Shop). In-store pickup costs 30 Kč but is free for orders over 200 Kč. Bulky shipping is priced from 349 Kč (PPL) up to 819 Kč (DHL) based on weight. The cash on delivery (COD) surcharge is a flat 29 Kč. NOTABLE FEATURES: A wide range of delivery options is available, including specialized services for atypical and pallet shipments. There are low free shipping thresholds for both in-store pickup (200 Kč) and home delivery (1500 Kč). A specific rule applies to COD payments at Zásilkovna lockers, requiring payment via their app. No express or weekend delivery options are mentioned. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented clearly on a single, dedicated 'Doprava a platba' page. All costs, providers, and key limitations (like weight and dimensions) are explicitly stated, making it easy for customers to understand their options. The information is comprehensive and well-organized.
